topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53d1c983636872276f3c0000#post_53d1c983636872276f3c0000

also responding hip hop has evolved, it was created in the 70´s tho, so it hasnt evolved as much as let say rock which has been for more decades.

of course i feel all genres (specially rap) has shifted toward being commercially succesfull isntead of trying to be different.

and those that try to be different dont get enough attention exept for like kendrick lamar.

-death grips
-chance the rapper
-the rest of OF.
-common
-mad lib
-MF DOOM
-freddie gibbs.

have you heard of these guys? probably not cause the mainstream barely cares.

so for example in rock you have whole decades of rock evolution ever since like the 50´s, meanwhile hip hop was noticed only in the late 70´s and the evolution stopped around the 0´6 of 2000, so yeah it was pretty young.
